product_name: Merrell Tailspin Toggle Waterproof Shoes - Kids'
long_description: Merrell Tailspin Toggle Waterproof kids' shoes boast a fast and easy lacing system to get them out on their adventures quickly and hassle-free. Waterproof suede leather uppers offer ample protection, flexibility and support for long-lasting performance; seam-sealed waterproof, breathble membranes keep feet dry. Quick-pull cord lacing system provides a snug, custom fit with just a single pull; heel and tongue loops aid entry and exit. Nylon mesh linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for comfort in hot conditions. Linings and removable footbeds are treated with AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to deter odors from developing. Compression-molded EVA midsoles with Air Cushion heel pockets supply shock absorption and cushioning for all-day play. Nylon arch shanks help support and stabilize feet. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Merrell Tailspin Toggle Waterproof kids' shoes supply confident traction.
short_description: Merrell Tailspin Toggle Waterproof kids' shoes boast a fast and easy lacing system to get them out on their adventures quickly and hassle-free.
